(?:^|/)(?i)COPYRIGHT
(?:^|/)(?i)LICEN[CS]E
(?:^|/)package(?:-lock|)\.json$
(?:^|/)vendor/
/LCID/(?!1033)..../
ignore$
\.avi$
\.ico$
\.jpe?g$
\.lock$
\.map$
\.min\.
\.mod$
\.mp[34]$
\.png$
\.wav$
^eng/_prettyprint\.sh$
^src/Microsoft\.Dotnet\.Sdk\.Internal/Class1\.cs$
^src/redist/targets/packaging/windows/clisdk/dummyeula\.rtf$
^\.gitattributes$
^\.github/
